characterDescription.skinTone: Fair skin with subtle cool pink undertones, creating a slightly flushed complexion, most noticeable on the cheeks. Even skin tone with no visible blemishes.
characterDescription.eyeColor: Bright sky blue eyes with a hint of grey, a darker blue limbal ring, and very subtle white flecks near the pupils.
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, with naturally long, light brown eyelashes. Subtle shadows under the eyes.
characterDescription.hairColor: Medium chestnut brown hair with natural auburn highlights in direct light, with slightly lighter brown ends. A very slight reddish undertone visible at the roots.
characterDescription.hairTexture: Fine, slightly wavy hair with soft, loose curls, particularly around the face and at the ends. The hair appears to be relatively thick in density, despite the fine strands.
characterDescription.hairStyle: Hair styled in two high pigtail buns secured with small, pink alligator clips, each adorned with a fluffy white pom-pom. Flyaway hairs and loose strands around the face add to a slightly disheveled look.
characterDescription.faceShape: Round face with full, prominent cheeks. A soft, undefined jawline gives the face a youthful, cherubic appearance.
characterDescription.nose: Small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip and a very subtle dorsal hump. The nostrils are narrow and not particularly flared.
characterDescription.lips: Full, rosy pink lips. The bottom lip is slightly fuller than the top lip, creating a subtle pout. No visible lip lines or cracks.
characterDescription.smile: No visible smile. The lips are pursed slightly, giving a serious expression. Teeth are not visible.
characterDescription.eyebrows: Light brown eyebrows, slightly darker than the hair, with a natural, slightly arched shape. The eyebrows are fairly thin and well-groomed.
characterDescription.ears: Medium-sized ears, positioned close to the head. Only the left ear is fully visible, with a slightly rounded lobe.
characterDescription.cheeks: Full, round cheeks with a natural rosy flush. No visible dimples, even in the absence of a smile.
characterDescription.chin: Rounded, soft chin that blends smoothly into the jawline. No cleft or prominent features.
characterDescription.facialProportions: Balanced facial proportions. The eyes are large relative to the face, while the nose and mouth are smaller and more delicate.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Very faint freckles across the bridge of the nose and on the upper cheeks, barely visible without close inspection. The skin under the eyes is slightly darker than the surrounding skin. Small amount of blue marker ink on the fingers.
characterDescription.overallImpression: Sweet, slightly serious, innocent appearance with youthful features. The large eyes and round face contribute to a baby-faced impression, while the pursed lips add a touch of contemplative maturity.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This young girl, estimated to be 5-6 years old, has fair skin with cool pink undertones and bright sky blue eyes with a darker limbal ring. Her medium chestnut brown hair, styled in high pigtail buns with pink pom-pom clips, is slightly wavy with auburn highlights. She has a round face with full cheeks, a small upturned nose, and full rosy pink lips, which are pursed slightly in a serious expression. Look for the faint freckles across the bridge of her nose and the slight darkness under her eyes, as well as a smudge of blue marker ink on her fingers.
